mainText:
This is the first public person who has ever passed away and left me with the level of sadness
 I am feeling.

I feel like I lost a great friend and the future of the world will suffer im
measurably. His vision that yielded some of the greatest products the consumer markets ever saw, is irreplaceable.

I can only try to imagine the conversation he is having,as I type, with the likes of Thomas Edison, Leonardo DaVinci, and scores of lesser geniuses.

The world was blessed to have him for the too few years he was given. He was
 a once in a lifetime person who gave so much.

I am happy he is out of his pain, and hope he rests in peace.

author: Carl
